div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 572px; height: 1080px; padding-top: 0px; margin-left: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; width: 572px; height: 1080px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; width: 100%; height: 100%; white-space: nowrap;

ol.li: using . or [] to get value: auther.name, auther["name"]
using delete to delete properties: delete auther.name
using delete to delete items: delete auther.books[1]

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
